attributes.action: Make all companies declare clearly on packaging whether they animal test or not
attributes.background: All companies should show very clearly whether they test their products on animals or not. It is not fair for people who want to buy only cruelty-free products, and not know if they are unwillingly contributing to the cruelty of animals.

rejection.details: We think that the following petition is on the same subject as yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/116491
